alert.note: Alert for Otero Mesa (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 02 at 12:55PM MST until February 03 at 11:00AM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of south central New Mexico and southwest Texas. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Thursday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow packed and potentially icy roads will create hazardous driving conditions. Significant travel delays will be possible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
